item.title: Optimizing Query Performance on C# ODP.NET - Oracle Managed Data Access
item.description: Oracle C# drive is already pretty fast with the default configuration. But we can always tweak it a little to make it even faster. By controlling the FetchSize property in ODP.NET we can make fewer round trips to Oracle Database and fetch the data faster. Let’s take a look at how it’s done and make your data access faster. Setup the Environment Before we get started let’s set up our environment for testing.
